Bash(python3 -c "
# 检查根目录数据库中的skills
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''/Users/hehe/pycharm_projects/aigc/backend''\)
from services.database import get_database_service
from models.database import SkillDB
import asyncio

async def check_root_db\(\):
    # 使用根目录的数据库
    db_service = get_database_service\(\)
    # 修改数据库路径到根目录
    db_service.db_path = ''/Users/hehe/pycharm_projects/aigc/data/sessions.db''
    
    await db_service.initialize\(\)
    
    async with db_service.async_session\(\) as session:
        from sqlalchemy import select, func
        stmt = select\(func.count\(SkillDB.id\)\)
        result = await session.execute\(stmt\)
        count = result.scalar\(\)
        
        print\(f''根目录数据库中有 {count} 个skills''\)
        
        if count > 0:
            stmt = select\(SkillDB\)
            result = await session.execute\(stmt\)
            skills = result.scalars\(\).all\(\)
            
            for skill in skills:
                print\(f''  - {skill.name} \(id={skill.id}\)''\)
    
    await db_service.close\(\)

asyncio.run\(check_root_db\(\)\)
")
